p: After the outbreak in China, Italy became the secondary source for spreading the disease with a rapidly increasing number of infected cases. Among Latin American countries, Brazil published a report of its first infected case. The first Brazilian case was a 61 years-old man with a 12-day travel history to Lombardy, Italy. On the first day of his arrival to Brazil he presented to the Hospital Albert Einstein in SÃ£o Paulo, where his initial real-time RT-PCR was positive for SARS-CoV-2. The patient displayed dry cough, fever, coryza, and sore throat. He was isolated at home, received standard precautionary care, and presented mild signs one week after his arrival to Brazil ( 16).
